results.firPara: Southampton have confirmed Claude Puel as their manager on a three-year contract. The 54-year-old former Monaco and Nice boss replaces Ronald Koeman, who left for Everton earlier this summer.
results.secPara: The former Aston Villa coach Eric Black has been named as Puels assistant. Pascal Plancque has also joined Puels backroom staff, while Southampton have agreed a deal to retain Dave Watson as a coach. Sammy Lee has left, however, as the Saints gear up for life after Koeman.
results.webTitle: Southampton appoint Frenchman Claude Puel as manager

results.firPara: Got a minute? Digest the best of our latest coverage from Euro 2016 as Poland and Portugal get the last-eight matches under way in Marseille
results.webTitle: The Euro 2016 minute: here come the quarter-finals

results.firPara: Dimitri Payets agent expects the France forward to stay at West Ham despite rumours linking him with a transfer to Real Madrid and Internazionale among others.
results.secPara: Payet, who is preparing for Frances Euro 2016 quarter-final against Iceland on Sunday, signed a contract in February worth an estimated £125,000 a week which is due to expire in 2021. He moved to West Ham last summer from Marseille for £10.7m and was nominated for the PFA player of the year ward after scoring nine Premier League goals.
results.webTitle: France’s Dimitri Payet happy to stay at West Ham next season, says agent

results.firPara: Eden Hazard has put an awful Chelsea season behind him to shine at Euro 2016 but there is a sense the worlds most promising 25-year-old veteran can do more
results.secPara: Eden Hazard has put an awful Chelsea season behind him to shine at Euro 2016 but there is a sense the worlds most promising 25-year-old veteran can do more
results.webTitle: Will Eden Hazard finally turn sparkle into true greatness for Belgium? | Barney Ronay

results.firPara: The Tottenham transfer target Vincent Janssen has admitted his frustration after AZ Alkmaar rejected €18m (£16.5m) for the Holland striker.
results.secPara: Mauricio Pochettino is searching for more forward options after missing out on a deal for Marseilles Michy Batshuayi and the Spurs manager has earmarked Janssen as the perfect back-up to Harry Kane. The 22-year-old finished as the top scorer in the Dutch league last season with 27 goals in 32 appearances.
results.webTitle: Tottenham target Vincent Janssen ‘disappointed’ £16.5m bid rejected

results.firPara: Do you know which player looks after hens, which Russia international turned out for Germany and who had an airport named after him for a day?
results.webTitle: Euro 2016 players quiz: retired chickens, a wine merchant and a Big Ben tattoo

results.firPara: Liverpool face a battle to sign Mahmoud Dahoud from Borussia Mönchengladbach, with the German club determined to resist any offers for the Germany Under-21 midfielder.
results.secPara: Dahoud, who was born in Syria, has been tracked by Jürgen Klopps club after an impressive season in which the 20-year-old made 32 Bundesliga appearances in midfield. He has attracted widespread interest around Europe, with Klopps former club Borussia Dortmund also interested in signing him.
results.webTitle: Liverpool face fight to sign Borussia Mönchengladbach’s Mahmoud Dahoud

results.firPara: A British music lecturer and his Costa Rican wife have released a song dedicated to the Wales forward, lauding him for having the talent to rip the world apart
results.secPara: A British music lecturer and his Costa Rican wife have released a song dedicated to the Wales forward, lauding him for having the talent to rip the world apart
results.webTitle: Gareth Bale urged to ‘unleash the dragon, let out the fire inside’ in tribute song

results.firPara: Liverpool have confirmed that Jerome Sinclair will join Watford after the two clubs reached an agreement over compensation for the striker.
results.secPara: Sinclair, who is the youngest ever player to have played for Liverpool having made his senior debut at the age of 16 years and six days against West Bromwich Albion in September 2012, is out of contract at Anfield having joined the club as a 14-year-old in 2011.
results.webTitle: Watford sign Jerome Sinclair after agreeing fee with Liverpool

results.firPara: The journey of Krzysztof Maczynski – and many of his Polish team-mates – to Euro 2016 has been far from straightforward but that makes their success in reaching the quarter-finals in France even sweeter
results.secPara: When Krzysztof Maczynski anchors the Poland midfield against Portugal on Thursday, he may remember the time he bore a heavier weight. Galeria Krakowska, which stands next to Krakows main railway station, is typical of the glitzy shopping malls that have sprung up around the country in recent years and it owes at least a tiny debt to an unsung player who has been instrumental to a summer of considerable promise in France.
results.webTitle: How Poland players overcame adversity to shake up Euro 2016 | Nick Ames
